TextLang.Text: Saved Data Utility (PS3™) will close, and you will return to the game. Do you want to continue?
The maximum number of Friends that the PS3™ system supports has been reached. Friends may not be displayed correctly.

%E: Save Screenshot
Controller %1 can now be used.
Controller %1 can no longer be used.
The battery for controller %1 is low. Connect the controller using a USB cable and recharge the battery.
No additional wireless devices can be connected.
The system has become hot. Please turn off the system and wait a while before turning it on again.
An unknown USB device has been connected.
Press the PS button.
You have reached the limit on the number of storage media devices. Remove a storage media device to continue.
Connect in USB mass storage mode.
There is now less than %1 free space on the system storage.
An unknown device has been connected.
You have been signed in to PSN for %1 hour(s). Excessive gameplay can harm your daily life.
Save Destination:
An error has occurred.
The maximum amount of power that can be supplied to USB devices has been reached. Remove at least one device.
There is not enough free space on the system storage.
The system storage cannot be accessed.
A network error has occurred.
The PS3™ system has been disconnected from the media server.
Access to the media server has been denied. Check the settings for the media server.
A connection to the media server could not be established. Check the settings for the media server and network devices.
The folder could not be accessed. This content may have been deleted from the media server.
The folder could not be accessed. This folder may have been deleted from the media server.
Media Server Error: An HTTP error (%1) has occurred.
Media Server Error: A DLNA protocol error (%1) has occurred.
Media Server Error: A network error has occurred.
Automatic Update
The system will turn off soon because the [System Auto-Off] setting is enabled. This setting can be adjusted under [Settings] > [Power Save Settings].
Register completed.
An error occurred during the register operation.
The battery level for wireless keypad (%1) is low.
The battery level for wireless headset (%1) is low.
Wireless headset (%1) has been disconnected.
No additional wireless devices can be registered.
An Ethernet cable is not connected.
The connection with Sony Entertainment Network timed out.
A connection error has occurred.
You have been disconnected from the access point.
CD information could not be found.
Multiple CD information items were found. Select [Obtain CD Information] from the options menu of the audio CD.
Multiple CD information items were found. Select the appropriate CD information item.
An error occurred while obtaining CD information. Go to [Settings] > [Network Settings] and check your settings.
An error occurred while obtaining CD information. If you update the system software to the latest version, you may be able to obtain CD information.
Facebook
Download completed.
There is not enough free space. The download operation stopped.
The maximum number of content items that can be saved has been reached. The download operation stopped.
An error occurred during the download operation.
An error occurred during communication with the server. This is a DNS error.
Download completed. Go to [Game] to install.
Download completed. Go to [Video] to install.
You have earned a trophy.
You did not earn a trophy.

An error occurred while signing in to [%1]. The user name or password is not correct.
has earned a trophy from PSN in "%1".
has earned %2 trophies from PSN in "%1".
The message could not be delivered because of the recipient's privacy settings.
Auto-Download of Pre-ordered Content
Signed out.
An error occurred during automatic sign-in. The sign-in ID (e-mail address) or password is incorrect.
Another user with the same online ID has signed in. You have been signed out.
An error has occurred. You have been signed out of PSN.
Sony Entertainment Network is closed.
Sony Entertainment Network is currently undergoing maintenance.
Sony Entertainment Network is busy. Try to sign in again later.
A system software update is required. Go to [Settings] > [System Update] and perform the update.
Access to Sony Entertainment Network by this account has been banned or temporarily suspended.
Access to Sony Entertainment Network from this system has been banned or temporarily suspended.
You must select [PSN] > [Sign In] and sign in to continue using PSN.
Communication with the server timed out.
%1 has reached the maximum number of Friends. The add operation could not be completed.
Friend Request
Profile
A message has been received. Sender: %1 Subject: %2
There is not enough free space on the system storage. A message could not be received. Messages are stored on the server for 30 days.
The message to %1 could not be sent.
Voice chat is not available. Check the NAT type for this system, and then refer to the online manual for details.
Voice chat with %1 is not available. Check the NAT type for this system, and then refer to the online manual for details.
%1 has invited you to a chat room for voice/text chat.
Note that while games and other features are in use, voice chat may become temporarily unavailable.
%1 has invited you to a chat room for text chat.
%1 has joined the chat room. Note that this User is on your block list.
%1 has joined the chat room.
%1 has left the chat room.
Signed in.
%1 is now offline.
%1 is now online.
You have received a message.
%1 has left the room. The chat room will close.
There is not enough free space on the system storage. The message could not be received.
